name: "Crash of the Titans" - "The Temple of Zoom" Trivia Game  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the first trial you come across?
questions.explanation:
Ropes.

	You never come across any lasers.  You will be ambushed in the game, and you will need to slide.  There are only three ropes, but if you miss a rope, you will fall onto a bed of sharp spikes, thus losing your life.

questions.text: What is the first colored temple you must enter?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	The first temple you enter is the red temple.  The red temple is the temple on the right of the center of the building.  You enter each temple on a monkey's tongue.

questions.text: What does the second bomb you hit give you?
questions.explanation:
Snipe.

	You have a few bombs you must hit, and every time you hit one, an enemy will appear.  The first bomb gives you a Spike, and the second gives you a Snipe.  You must use the Snipe to hit two targets, which will give you a pathway to continue on.

questions.text: What new feature do you learn in this level?
questions.explanation:
Slide.

	In this level, you must learn the slide move.  There are two stones at the beginning of the slide you must read.  The left stone tells you that X+R1 slides, and the right stone tells you that while sliding, square is a spin attack, and triangle ends the slide.

questions.text: What is the second colored temple you must enter?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	The second temple is the green temple.  You enter this temple on yet another monkey tongue.  The green temple is on the left of the building.

questions.text: While you are in the boarding ramp, Ratnicians yell out a few movies.  Which of these is a movie the Ratnicians yell out?
questions.explanation:
Both of these.

	Ratnicians yell out several things, including movies.  They mention "Flubber" and "Chitty Chitty Bang Bang".  Ratnicians are Rat technicians who make chemical compounds that can blow you up.

questions.text: You get the concept art voodoo doll at the end of the first temple.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Actually, you get the concept art at the end of the second temple.  All concept art voodoo dolls are red.  They unlock pictures of the concept of the game.  Some of them are very interesting.

questions.text: What is the final colored temple you enter?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	The final temple you enter is the blue temple.  It is the temple directly in front of you when you first enter the giant monkey statue.  You must enter it to fight the final battle of the level.

questions.text: Do you ever fight any Ratnicians in the beginning of the temple where you can enter all three colored temples?
questions.explanation:
No.

	This place is the safest place of the game.  You will never see an enemy there.  The only enemies you will fight are in the colored temples and on top of the statue.

questions.text: What new beast do you find in this level?
questions.explanation:
Yuktopus.

	The Yuktopus is one of the main enemies of the game.  You must defeat the Yuktopus, which is a Duck, Octopus, and bagpipe player at the end of this level.  It is the only Yuktopus you will ever fight in this level.
